tool_description: Unlock limitless language possibilities with Google Translate API on Rapid API – Affordable, High-Quality, Any Language, Instant Detection!
name: Free Google Translate
title: Free Google Translate

api_list.name: Language List
api_list.description: # Get the list of all languages with their short code to use
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-google-translate.p.rapidapi.com/list/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-google-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://free-google-translate.p.rapidapi.com/list/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-google-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
